title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: A bustling scene on a dock. A large lake is behind the dock, a stage is off to the left, and the whole place is being dressed for Halloween. Beyond the lake, a lighthouse looks over the scene. At center is a booth for a radio station. The camera moves in

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: We're here live at the KOZY 102.1 Hallween Haunt at the South Park docks! Come on down! We've got a haunted house and everyone is decorating for tomorrow night,  HALLOWEEN, when the band KoRn, that's right, KoRn, is going to play live! And don't forget to wear a costume tomorrow, because there's a big first prize! Why, here's some kids enjoying the Halloween Haunt now!  Say boys, what do you think of KOZY-FM's Halloween Haunt so far?

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: This one time, like eight months ago, I saw two guys kissing in a park. And that was the gayest thing I'd ever seen, until I saw the KOZY-FM Halloween Haunt.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Uh-hall right! Well, enjoy the spooky docks, kids.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Further down the dock. The boys keep walking, and Cartman runs up to meet them

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Hey you guys!  You know what time of year it is?

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Of course, dumbass, it's Halloween.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: That's right, and that means only two more months till Christmas! You'd better watch out, you'd better not cry

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Christmas?

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Christmastime is presents for me.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: On another part of the dock, Jimbo and Ned leave a ticket booth

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Aw, nuts! Come on, Ned, this ain't no whore house, it's a hor-ROR house.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Awwww!

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Eeyyy , Spooky Laboratory, you guys.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Those things are stupid, Cartman. They just stick your hand in cold spaghetti and tell you it's intestines and stuff.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Well, I'm going to Spooky Laboratory! Jingle Bells, Jingle Bells...

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Welcome to Spooky Laboratory.  I'm your guide, Dr. Spookalot. Allow me to show around the lab.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Cool!

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Here I have a bowl of human eyeballs.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Ewww-hoohooo.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: And here you can feel the brains.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Oh-HO, grohoss.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: And here you can feel the warm innards of the body

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Eewww, it feels like cold spaghetti! You guys, it feels like cold spaghetti!

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: (You guys, I'm gonna try and win that costume contest!)

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Give it up, Kenny! You're not gonna win that costume contest! Your costumes always suck.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: BOO!

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Aaaaah!

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Ha ha ha ha ha! We scared you, chickens!

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: W-we weren't scared!

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Oh no? Well, you should be!  The pirate ghosts are gonna come getcha!

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: The what?

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Didn't you know? There's an old legend in South Park that says these docks are haunted by pirate ghosts.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Nuh-uh.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Yuh-huh. They roam these docks with their swords and hook-hands  looking for victims tuh...  cut up!

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: (Hoh!)

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: That's just an old legend.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Rar!

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Aaaaah!

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Ha ha ha ha, gotcha again, heh ha ha! Just wait till tomorrow! We're gonna scare you kids to death! Ha ha ha haa!

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: You guys, my hand totally smells like spaghetti now. Smell it.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: I'm sick of those fifth graders scaring us all the time! We should come up with a way to scare them!

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Yeah! Let's see how they like it!

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: The KOZY-FM booth. The DJ is joined by the town's priest

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Joining me now is Father Maxi, from the South Park Church. Father, what do you think of all the preparations here at the docks?

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Halloween is an abomination of God! A celebration of the occult-eh!

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Yeah, and how about KoRn playing the big concert tomorrow? Pretty exciting, huh?

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: KoRn is a devil-worshipping group that plays violent music! If we allow that demon band to play on this most unholy of holidays, we may incur the full wrath of evil!

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Alriight, we'll see you tomorrow for Halloween! In the meantime  here's a KOZY hit by Barry Manilow.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: The lake. The boys are still on the docks...

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Come on, you guys, think! How can we scare the fifth graders? It has to be something reeaally scary.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: We could get a big scary plastic spider, and dangle it in front of them on a string... s- spooky spider, that's pretty scary.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: That's not scary, fatass!

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Well, come on! We can think of something better than stupid pirate ghosts!

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Darrrr!

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: The woods. A van rumbles down a road. On the side it reads, "KoRn." Several men inside it talk

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Are you sure we're goin' the right way?

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: I don't know. This map doesn't make any sense.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: That's because you've got it upside down, chowderhead!

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Oops.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: When are we gonna get to the gig? I'm starving.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Don't think about it. We'll just keep playing our game. Raady? I spy with my little eye something that begins with the letter T!

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: I know! A t-ree!

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: You've got it. I spy with my little eye something that begins with the letter R.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: A road?

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: That's it!

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Darrrr!

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: further down the road...

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Okay, here's one. I spy with my little eye something that begins with the letter P.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: The letter P?

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: What the heck starts with the letter P?

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Puh-pirate ghosts!

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Aaaaah!

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: The Cartman house. Cartman walks towards the sofa with a catalog in hand

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Mom! You got the new Duffy's catalog! I-I'm gonna circle everything I want for Christmas, okay? Mom? Okay? O-kay , let's see.  I waant... thiis... aand... this...  and...  let's see, comes with so... ...comes with two bars , so there we go, have that...  and, let's see...

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Eric, your little friends are here.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Mom, mom! You wanna see what I want for Christmas?

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: E-heric, it's only Halloween.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: That's only 72 shopping days left for you!

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Come on, fatass, we have to go!

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Ey! Don't call me fat!  Mom, don't laugh.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: I'm sorry, hon,

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: I can't go with you guys right now.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Yes you can, porky.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Mom, seriously!

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Oh, that's not funny, boys. Eric isn't fat, his big-boned.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: He must have a huge bone in his ass, then.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: God-damnit, mom!

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Outside, night. The boys head out and away

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: God, I hate you guys!

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Okay, so we figured out how to scare the fifth graders.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: How?

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: What's the scariest thing we could get?

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Spooky spider?

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: No!  A dead body.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Yeah, fatass, a dead body.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: You mean, we make something that looks like a dead body?

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: We could never make one that looks real enough.  To be really scary, it would have to be real.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Yeah, fatass, it has to be real to be scary!

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: So where the hell are we going to get a dead body?

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: We're gonna dig up Kyle's dead grandma.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Yeah, fatass, we're goona dig up-  Dig up Kyle's dead grandma??

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Dude, she's perfect. She only died, like, three months ago, right?

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Are you insane?!

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: U-hi think that's a sweet idea!

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: (Yeah!)

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Dude! We'er not digging up my grandma; I'll get in trouble.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: All we have to do is sneak in the graveyard, dig her up, scare the fifth graders, then put her back before anyone notices she's gone,

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Naww, let's dig up somebody else.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Relax, dude. What's the big deal? Think about it: if your grandma knew that she could help you, even in death, she would want to.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: This is gonna be fun!

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: The graveyard. Spooky music and a howling wolf punctuate the foggy atmosphere as a full moon rises. Kyle leads the way with a flashlight. Cartman is singing

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Just hear those sleigh bells jingle-in', ring ting tingle-in' too

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
role: Outside it's lovely weather for a sleigh ride together with you,
text: and you, and you.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Cartman, will you stop singing Christmas carols? We have to be quiet, or else we're gonna get busted!

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: This must be it. "Cleo Broflovski" That's my grandma.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Well, let's dig 'er up!

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Wait. I don't know if this is cool.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Of course it's cool! She's gonna be all rotted and scary!

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: I don't think my mom would want me doin' this.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: "Ooh, I don't wanna dig up my dead grandma 'cause I'm such a goody-two-shoes!" Ow.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: You guys be quiet! Now, do you wanna get back at the fifth graders or not?!

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: I don't really care, dude.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Yes you do! Now, dig!

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Outside the snow is falling and friends are calling, "You-hoo"...

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Later. The casket is now vertical, leaning against the tombstone

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Okay. It's almost open. Ready? One, two, three!  Whoa, dude.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Oh, my God.  Hi, ...Grandma.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Hi, Kyle.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Aaaah!

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Have you been a good boy, Kyle? Have you been making Grandma proud?

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Damnit, Cartman, that's not funny!

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Eheh, yes, it ihis, heh.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Heh heh, I'm sweet.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Alright, alright, let's get this over with so we can put her back!

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Okay, grab the sled.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: The docks. A dog is sniffing at the boards, then raises his head. He growls and runs off stage left. The boys come in from the other side pulling the corpse, and Cartman sings

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Silver Bells, Silver Bells, it's Christmas time in the city...

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Okay. Let's just hide her here, and tomorrow, during the Halloween party, we'll come back in our costumes and use her to scare the fifth graders.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: How exactly are we gonna use her to scare them?

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: We could shove a stick up her ass and use her like a puppet: "Rowr, rowr, I'm scary Grandma!"

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Alright, that does it, Cartman! That's my grandma! You show her some God-damned respect!

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: O-o-o-o-oh.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Who was that?

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Cartman?!

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: It wasn't me!

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Who-o-oa.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Dude, not cool. This is scary.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Wa-a-a-ah!

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Hey! Like, it's just some kids.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Oh, fwooh, I was really scared there, for a second.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Hay, you're that band KoRn.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Yeah. I'm Jonathan , and this is Munky , David , Fieldy , and Head . And over there is our pal, Nibblet.  Hey, where'd Nibblet go?

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Uh-huh, Nibblet likes potato chips.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Nibblet!

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Okay.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: What are you guys doing out here?

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
role: Head;	We were just driving our van when all of a sudden we were
text: run off the road by some super-spooky pirate ghosts.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Aw, dude, that was just the fifth graders.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Yeah. They're tryin' to scare everybody 'cause they're gay wads.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Don't worry. We're about to go get 'em back.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Oh, swell. We're supposed to play here tomorrow. Do you know where the stage is?

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Yeah, dude. It's right over there.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: O-kay!

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Oh, hi. We're KoRn. We're supposed to play the Halloween concert tomorrow.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: I know who you are and what you stand for! I think your music and Halloweenn is an abomination!

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Groovy! Could you show us where to set up?

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: The boys walk a little further, and Cartman pulls the sled over to one side of a stack of boxes

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Alright, let's just set her over here behind these boxes.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Shouldn't we hide her better than that?

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Kyle, will you stop worrying? God! Now, we'll all be back here tomorrow with our costumes, and then, when the Halloween party gets going, we'll bust out dead Grandma! Let's go!

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Wait till you guys see my costume! It's gonan be sweet!

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: (Mine is so fuckin' badass it's gotta win now!)

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Oh, come on, Kenny! You never have a sweet costume! You're not gonna win the costume contest!

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: (Yes I am! I've got the costume; it's waiting in the house! Yesterday I got this huge package in the mail, and it was big, okay?)

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: The next day. Two uniformed men approach the Broflovski house. One of them rings the bell.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Hold on, kids.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Mrs. Broflovski?

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Yes?

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: We're from Mt. Peaceful Cemetery. Could we have a word with you?

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Eehh, sure, come in.  What is it?

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Ms. Broflovski... somebody has defiled your mother's grave.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Defiled? How?

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Well, I'm afraid that... somebody dug her up.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Dug her up? Why??

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Well. Theh- most likely reason is that... somebody wanted to have sex with her dead body.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Yeahp.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: What?!

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Uhuh, we don't want to upset you, but it happens. Somebody's probably making love to her corpse as we speak.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Every vile position, every disrespectful act imaginable.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Hoh, dear God!

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Yes. By now he's probably even removed her eyes and made love to the empty sockets as well.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Oooh.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: No-, we don't want to upset you, but you should know that your mother's body would be stiff and dry, so he would have to have it soaked in warm water for several hours before making love to it.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: O-o-o-o-oh!

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Yes. And, now for the difficult part.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Brace yourself.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: It is highly possible that he has created new orifices in her decomposing flesh, leaving her to look something like  an overloved hunk of Swiss cheese. She probably-

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Okay, okay! I get the point! Just tell me what you're gonna do about it!

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Oh, we don't do anything. We're just the watchmen.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Yeah, I guess, maybe, you might wanna call the police or something.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: O-o-ogh!

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Now, he probably would make love to the dead body in a cool dry place, so as not to allow further decomposition.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: The Cartman house. A delivery man walks towards it with a package and rings the bell. Cartman answers

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Package delivery for Mrs. Cartman?

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: A package? Oh, really? Well, I think I can sign for that!

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Sign heah, and heah, and heah.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: I got a Christmas present! I got a Christmas present!  ...Maybe I can see what it is. I'll just open one little corner.  Let's see here.  That's good, I'll rewrap it later!  Oh, sweet! Life-sized blow-up Antonio Banderas love doll! With realistic geni-ta-lia.  Oh, this kicks ass! What a cool Christmas present my mom got!

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: The lake. The docks are bustling again, and the DJ is in his booth

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: It's Halloween day, so come on down to the docks and bring your costumes!

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Where's Kenny? He said he had the best Halloween costume ever.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Nyah nyahnyahnyah nyah nyah. Guess wha-at I got? Antonio Banderas blow-up doll. You guys didn't get one.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Where's your costume, fatass?

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Screw Halloween, I already got my Christmas present! In a few days I'll wrap it back up, and then when I open it on Christmas, I'll act all, like, surprised, like "Oh Mother, Antonio Banderas life-sized blow-up doll! What a surprise!"

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Hey, Kenny.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: (Hey, guys. Uh, check out this kick-ass cool costume.)

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: U-huh, nice costume, Kenny. If you think you're gonna win with that, huh!

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Alright. The fifth graders are gonna be here soon. Let's get Kyle's grandma! This is gonna be sweet

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Uuh, problem, guys.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: What's the problem?

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Nno Grandma.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: No Grandma??

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Nno Grandma.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: She's not here!

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: She has to be here!

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Well, she's not here! That's just great! Thanks a lot, Stan! You're gonna get me busted again!

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: City Hall, outside. Officer Barbrady stands behind a podium addressing the crowd

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Okay, people. I know we all want to get down to the docks for the Halloween Haunt, but first we just need to inform you about thee- people or persons out there digging up bodies to have sex with them. Gentlemen?

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Good afternoon, ladies and gentlemen. A person who steals bodies to have sex with them is called a necrophiliac. So that you all know what to expect, my partner Alan has a sketch of what having sex with a dead body might look like.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Ee-oooh!

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Yes, we know it's horrible. It's probably best you not look at it. Now, Alan will demostrate what having sex with a dead body might sound like.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Awwwgh!

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Excuse me, how is this helping?

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: That's it, folks. Now, we can all go to the docks and enjoy the Halloween Haunt.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Noo! Don't go to the docks!  Aarrrgh! Argh, I'm Captain Bly! You land-lubbers had better stay away from the docks! Or else, there'll be hell to pay!  Fire the cannon!  Har harharharhar!

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Arrrgh!

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: We won't warn ya again! Stay away from our docks!

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: I warned you! I told you this would happen!  When you allow bands like KoRn to come to town and play your hedonistic Hallowen concerts, this is what you get!

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: The docks. KoRn is practicing on stage.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Great rehearsal, gang. That was really groovy. Let's practice one more time before the show starts.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Aah, guys, I'm sorry, but the Halloween Haunt's been cancelled.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Cancelled?

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: You best clear out of here! There's pirate ghosts, and they'll kill you.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Well gang, it looks like we have to pack it up.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Awww.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: God-damnit! Now, what the hell are we gonna do?!

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Oh, hey! The kids from last night.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Wow! Is that the Antonio Banderas life-sized blow-up doll?

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Hey, Kenny.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: (Aw, man!)

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Say, what's the matter? You kids look kind of glum.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Somebody took my dead grandma.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: What?

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: We dug her up 'cause we wanted to scare the fifth graders, but then, something took her body away.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Now she's doomed to walk the earth in limbo.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Aw, I hate to see little clowns cry.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Well, that does it. Somethin' funny is going on here. Your missing grandma must be connected somehow to those creepy pirate ghosts.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: They're not pirate ghosts, Jonathan, they're ghost pirates.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Huh?

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: "Pirate ghost" would suggest that a pirate died, and became a ghost, but a ghost pirate is a ghost that later made a conscious decision to be a pirate.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: No, David. Then they are pirate ghosts, because they're the ghosts of pirates.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: You're wrong, because there were no pirates in Colorado. So these must be ghosts that have decided to become pirates after the fact.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: But that makes them pirate ghosts.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: No. It makes them ghost pirates.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Pirate ghosts!

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Guys! Guys! Guys! Fighting isn't gonna solve anything. Don't you see? This is exactly what those ghost pirates want us to do.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Pirate ghosts.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Then, you'll help us?

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Sure, we'll help you. If there's one thing we like more than playing music, it's solvin' a groovy mystery.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Al-right!

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: City Hall. People are still laying on floor. Chef arrives

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Is everybody okay?

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: People stealing bodies to have sex with them? Pirate ghosts destroying the town? When did everything go so wrong?

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: I hate to say it, but I think Priest Maxi was right. This is what we get for celebrating Halloween and allowing that band KoRn to come play.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: He's right! Nothin' ever went wrong in this town before that evil KoRn band showed up.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Well, I say we go find them and kick their devil-worshipping butts out of town!

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Yeah!

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Lynch mob!

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Down with KoRn!

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Halloween night, the docks. KoRn and the boys are still talking...

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: So this is where you last saw your dead grandma.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Right.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Maybe there really are pirate ghosts and they took her inside.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Alright, gang, we have to split up and look for clues.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: How should we split up?

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: I know. Let's have everyone who enjoys having obstacles in their life, which they can overcome, go this way,  and everyone whose insecurities sabotage their potential to overcome those obstacles go that way.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: O-kay!

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Wow! That was easy.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: The lynch mob reaches the docks and head for the van. Randy reaches it first.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Here's their van! Here's their van!

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Let's flip it over!

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Yeah!

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Okay, people, let's try to stay orderly. The best way to do this is, all get on one side and push it from the top.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Devil woshippers!

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Yeah!

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Come on, they gotta be around here somewhere!

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: A warehouse. The secure group walks along with Nibblet. Munky is not with them.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: This place gives me the creeps.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Say, this looks like a clue.  "Pirate Lore of South Park." Hmmm. Now, why would pirate ghosts need a book on pirates?

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Whoa. What was that?

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: The noise came from in here. Stay close, everybody!

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Oh, no! I lost my glasses.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: The insecure group walks in a darkened part of the warehouse. Munky is in that group now.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: What does this dead grandma look like?

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Uh, she was all, like, crunchy and crispy and stuff.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Hey, I got an idea.  We should set a groovy trap.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Good idea.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: How do we trap a bunch of pirate ghosts?

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: We need something that might catch their eye to use as bait. I know, your Antonio Banderas love doll.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Oh, no! This is my Christmas present! If anything happens to it, my mom will know I opened it early!

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Come on, kid. We all have to do our part, even Antonio.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: The lit side of the warehouse. Fieldy is still looking for his glasses

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: My glasses gotta be around here somewhere. Is that you, Jonathan? Boy, I'm glad to see you. I lost my glasses.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Raaarrrgh!

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Hey, you got a cold, Jonathan?

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Raarraarrgh!

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Yeah, that sounds like a groovy song, man! Remember that one!

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Fieldy, what are you doing?!

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Oh, I was talking to you, Jonathan. ...Hey, wait a minute. If you're over there, then how could you be over here? Unless you're actually a...

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Puh-puuhh pirate ghost!

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Raaarrrgh!

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: The darkened part of the warehouse. The trap is set

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Okay. Here's how the trap will work. When the pirate ghosts walk in, they should go right for Antonio Banderas. When they hit the super-slippery floor, they'll slide onto this mining cart, which should travel down this path, into the next room, where the fish net will fall on them.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Wow, cool!

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Hey! Somebody's coming.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Aaaaah!

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: We've got to hide!

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Hey, there's Antonio Banderas! He'll help us.  Mr. Banderas!

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Jonathan, no!

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Aaaah!

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Oh, no!

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Aaaah!

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Ow!

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Hold on, guys!

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Alright, KoRn, time for you to get out of town!

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Aarrrrgh.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Aaaaaah!

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: KoRn is sending their demon minions upon us!

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Aaaaaah!

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Alright, gang. Looks like we're gonna have to use our special KoRn powers. KoRn powers, vitalize!

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Munky!

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: David!

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Fieldy!

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Head!

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Jonathan!

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Form of... CORN!

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Alright! Great job, gang!

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: That didn't help at all.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: We know. It's just cool to do.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Aarrrrgh!

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Nibblet!

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Nibblet!

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: What the hell is that thing??

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: You did it, Nibblet! You trapped them!

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Yeah. And now let's see who these pirate ghosts really are!  Oh, I guess they really were pirate ghosts.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Alright, KoRn, you can stop your demonic shenanigans and come downtown with me!

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Hehey, look what Nibblet sees.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Whoa!

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: What the...?

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Fr. Maxi?

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Well, what are you waiting for, Barbrady?! Arrest that band!

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Oh?

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: No! Arrest him!

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Huh??

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: I think I've got this groovy mystery solved!

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Outside. The mystery has apparently been explained. The priest is now under arrest

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Well, I must say I still don't get this at all.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: It's simple. Priest Maxi didn't want there to be a Halloween, so he decided to scare everyone away from the docks.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Yeah. And then he used this flashlight and some cotton swabs to create the ghosts.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Then all he needed was some sound effects created by this cup and a piece of cheese. Aaaaraargh!

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: And all he had to do then was create a ghost ship, by using some candles, a mirror, and two squirrels.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Father, why did you go to all this trouble?

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Because Halloween is an abomination of God. I would do anything to stop this wretched, unholy holiday!

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Including killing people and wreaking havoc all over South Park?

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Don't you see that by trying to stop Halloween you've scared the hell out of everybody?

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: No.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Okay buddy, you can explain downtown!

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Well, this is all fine and good, but it doesn't explain what happened to my mother's body!

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Yeah! Where's Grandma?

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Eeewww!

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: There she is!

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Oooh!

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Ho-hoh.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Well thanks a lot, KoRn! You KoRn powers really came through for us!

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Yes! We were wrong about you. Will you please play for our Halloween party?

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Well, sure. Why the heck not?

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: All right!

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Raarrrr!

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Oh, no! The pirate ghosts are back!

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Nibblet!

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Uh oh!

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: The stage on the docks. KoRn is preparing for their concert. The mob is spread out in front of the stage. Jonathan takes the mic.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Well, this sure has been a wacky night, but me and the gang learned a lot, and we hope you did too. You all perceived us to be mean, evil people, but, really, we're just normal guys. And we all perceived pirate ghosts to be real when, actually, they were just cotton swabs. So I guess the lesson is: it's easy to perceive somethin' someway, and then be wrong. So we all need to learn to be a little less perceptive.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Yeah.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: The gang and I wrote a song about it, and it goes goes a little somethin' like this:

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
role: And a-one, and-a-two, and a [goes right into "Falling Away From
text: Me." The strobe lights come on, and the crowd looks a little stunned. The fifth graders are at the very front of the crowd, and the body of Grandma Broflovski inches up to them]

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Boo!

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Aaaah!

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Sweet!

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: Antonio, no!  You son of a bitch chicken from outer space... thing, come back here!

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: And the winner of the costume contest is  Wendy, for her Chewbacca costume! Come on up, Wendy.

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: (Awww.)

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: End of KORN's Groovy Pirate Ghost Mystery... Wait a minute! Dejected, Kenny walks away slowly from the crowd. A tiny snowspeeder flies by and wraps a cable around his costume's legs. He begins to stumble

title: KORN S GROOVY PIRATE GHOST MYSTERY
text: (What the hell? What the fuck is this?!)
